## normalizedLevenshtein variable

Normalized version of [levenshtein](./arrays.levenshtein.md)<!-- -->, i.e. the actual L-dist divided by the length of the longest input (or `Infinity` if actual distance &gt; `maxDist`<!-- -->).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
normalizedLevenshtein: <T>(a: ArrayLike<T>, b: ArrayLike<T>, maxDist?: number, equiv?: (a: any, b: any) => boolean) => number
```
